verses.roman:
ei-mata gauracandra nija-bhakta-saṅge
nīlācale krīḍā kare kṛṣṇa-prema-taraṅge

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; gauracandra—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nija-bhakta-saṅge—with His own devotees; nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; krīḍā kare—executes different pastimes; kṛṣṇa-prema-taraṅge—in the waves of love of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, at Jagannātha Purī, performed His various pastimes with His own devotees in the waves of love for Kṛṣṇa.
